question: Why there are some other pages here in addition to the issues archive itself? It's not how newsletters work!
answer: The idea of this project is to not only share [the metaframeworks news](/archive), but also to learn and educate, to help people comprehend metaframeworks and ecosystem around them, and choose what is appropriate for them without any FOMO or unknowns-driven doubts. That's why there's [the Encyclopedia of Metaframeworks](https://github.com/fyodorio/awesome-metaframeworks), and [the Metaframeworks Comparison](/comparison), and many interesting thing more potentially. Stay tuned!
